response.overview: Take your surfing to the next level with 110% Surfing Techniques Volume 4. Over one hour of top tips, information, and techniques. Volume 4 has three big sections on how to read waves, and lots of backhand surfing tuition.  Volume 4 also covers some surfing fundamentals, with the aim of improving your technique. For example taking off, paddling, and catching waves, as well as lots of forehand surfing information. The instructional videos have information, top tips, technique breakdown, fault correction and lots of camera angles to help visualize the tips. There are goofy foot versions of the more technical videos too, to help you apply the tips to your surfing. And there is also the full length video with subtitles.  NEW: Plus an extra 16 minute video (4.14) on surfing over reef and how to wipeout, recently added. Filmed in England, WA, France, Canary Islands, Indonesia and Maldives.
response.title: 110% Surfing Techniques Vol. 4
